snippet: Christie’s is auctioning research materials used by C. T. Loo, a leading dealer in Chinese artifacts in the first half of the 20th century.
abstract: Eve M Kahn Antiques column; Christie's in New York will auction reference materials belonging to C T Loo, a leading dealer in Chinese artifacts in the first half of the 20th century; Swann's Auction Galleries will sell 400 antique pens.
lead_paragraph: Christie’s is auctioning research materials used by C. T. Loo, a leading dealer in Chinese artifacts in the first half of the 20th century.

headline.seo: Notes From the Dealer C. T. Loo, and Pens of a Certain Age
headline.main: A Chinese Dealer, Trafficker in Mystery
headline.print_headline: A Chinese Dealer, Trafficker in Mystery
